text: She is expecting her first child with husband Jose Baston. And pregnant Eva Longoria showcased her beautiful baby bump as she grabbed a bite to eat in Los Angeles on Thursday. The actress, 42, looked healthy and happy as she enjoyed some lunch after pampering herself with a salon session in Beverly Hills. She's got that glow! Pregnant Eva Longoria showcased her beautiful baby bump as she grabbed a bite to eat in Los Angeles on Thursday Dressing to impress, the Desperate Housewives star sported a form fitting black Naked Wardrobe dress that highlighted her delicate decolletage. Eva kept warm from the unseasonably colder weather in Los Angeles with the long - sleeve dress, throwing on a casual black cardigan after finishing up her pampering session.
